messages.title: SUPPORT GROWS FOR CAROL
messages.content: More and more Durham people are switching to the Liberal Democrats... It's time for real change

messages.title: Let down by Labour
messages.content: Our Labour MP does not deserve to win again here. She charges taxpayers Â£1,330 of her expenses made for repaying her mortgage. She voted against a 10p tax rate for the lowest paid. Labour have taken Durham for granted. It's time for a change.

messages.title: Yes! I'm backing change in Durham!
messages.content: After decades of Labour neglect, it's time for a change in Durham. I'm backing Carol Woods and the Lib Dems this time.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Carol's campaign for a fair deal for Durham includes more police on our streets, and real action to create and safeguard jobs in our area.

mentions.tacticalSituation: More and more people are backing the Liberal Democrats. With your support, Carol is on track to win. Register your support today!

issues.economy: real action to create and safeguard jobs in our area.

leaflet.personalStatement: Support is growing for Carol Woods' campaign for a fair deal for Durham.

contactInformation.address: Durham Liberal Democrats, FREEPOST RRSZ-ZHTA-CATA, Durham, DH1 3HN

leaflet.additionalNotes: After decades of Labour neglect, it's time for a change in Durham. I'm backing Carol Woods and the Lib Dems this time.
